about_text: Digital agency DTT stands for experience, beautiful design and viable solutions, awarded with top positions and many thousands of five-star reviews in the app stores. We specialize in conceptualizing, designing, positioning and developing mobile solutions, web solutions and games. Our services include managed hosting, security, management and maintenance. Depending on the specifications of the project, we develop applications in a native, hybrid or web technique. We welcome all types of clients; governments, SMEs, multinationals, private, start-ups and investors. Feel free to call or email us for more information or stop by for an informal chat.
